channel.title: Updates
channel.description: hello guys i need to ask how to make cache updater like i wanna put some new models in but i dont wanna redownload hole cache is it possible to add files seperatly?

item.title: Updates
item.dc:creator: @jubagas12345 jubagas12345
item.description:
@jubagas12345 wrote:

i found this how to make it that it loads from client ?

public void preloadModels() { File file = new File(signlink.findcachedir() + "/raw/"); File afile[] = file.listFiles(); for(int i = 0; i < afile.length; i++) { String s = afile[i].getName(); byte abyte0[] = ReadFile(signlink.findcachedir() + "/raw/" + s); Model.method460(abyte0, Integer.parseInt(getFileNameWithoutExtension(s)));

Read full topic

item.title: Updates
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

What revision? With some clients if you add a /Models/ folder (case sensitive), and put the new models in there, then load the client and in-game type, ‘add models’ or ‘addmodels’ or something along those lines, it’ll add them to the cache.

Read full topic
